snippet.title: Cool Rules for the FCC: In the Lions's Den
snippet.description:
Cool Rules for the FCC: In the Lions's Den
Testifying as an expert witness on bandwidth management at the FCC's field hearing in snowy Cambridge this Monday was a heady experience. The hearing took place in a cramped corner of the Harvard Law School, a building that was already decorated with pickets, banners, and reporters when I arrived. Gingerly stepping through the â€¦
Richard Bennett, 28 Feb 2008
